title: Kain Panjang (long Sarong), early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand drawn wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
description: Long horizontal rectangular sarong (kain panjang) in blue and light brown features a repeat of a curving floral vine, birds, and other creatures. The ground is covered by thick tendrils. There are no borders.

tombstone.epitaph:
Kain Panjang (long Sarong), early 20th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: hand drawn wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave. 1974-9-5.
